title: Correction: Early postnatal exposure to isoflurane causes cognitive deficits and disrupts development of newborn hippocampal neurons via activation of the mTOR pathway
fullText: The Academic Editor’s name and affiliation information was omitted from the original published article. The publisher apologizes for the error. The Academic Editor’s name and affiliation is as follows: Lisa Monteggia, UT Southwestern Medical Center, United States of America.
